name: Stickee Climber
description:
Is that an ant? Is it a bird? No! It’s stick man — the ultimate climbing & sticking hero! Are you ready to take on the best climbing adventure out there? Or should we say, sticking experience?

In Stickee Climber, you stick to walls as you scale a challenging obstacle course. Cling on and more your stick man to the end — if you can? Avoid the obstacles by swinging out of the way. You’ll have so much fun.

FEATURES:

- Lots of levels
- Exciting gameplay
- Tons of fun
